_description: Structured template for generating presentation concept images

example_filled.title: The Wall of Text Problem
example_filled.visual_concept: Unstructured text creates chaos and unpredictability in AI outputs
key_elements: Dense paragraph of unstructured text (chaotic visual)
Multiple diverging arrows showing different outputs
Contrast between cluttered input and scattered results

composition.visual_hierarchy: chaotic text block > diverging arrows > scattered outputs

example_filled.metaphor: A tangled mess splitting into unpredictable paths

rendering_instructions.title_requirement: Title must be clearly readable and prominent
rendering_instructions.text_constraint: No verbatim bullet points or speaker notes
rendering_instructions.visual_approach: Use diagrams, icons, metaphors, visual hierarchies

usage_notes.key_elements_guidance: 3-5 visual elements maximum. Be specific but concise.
usage_notes.visual_concept_guidance: One clear sentence describing the core idea to visualize.
composition_layout_options: diagram_focused - Technical diagram or flowchart emphasis
usage_notes.style_ref_note: References external style config. Brief mention only, no full style duplication.
